DOC.brief_summary: Magnification narrow band imaging (NBI) can make accurate evaluation in in predicting of invasive depth of colorectal neoplasia.
DOC.brief_title: The Value of Narrow Band Imaging in Stratifying Patients for Endoscopic Resection or Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: NBI could be used in stratifying patients for endoscopic resection or surgery and got an accurate evaluation.
DOC.criteria: Consecutive patients with more than one lesion ≧6mm Patients with chronic inflammatory bowel disease, advanced cancer, insufficient bowel preparation, familial adenomatous polyposis (FAP) Lesions ≦ 5mm and submucosal tumor (SMT).
